Colossus Docs


Colossus is a speedier, more lightweight Express JS alternative.

View the Project on GitHub ProjectColossus/Colossus

This project is maintained by ProjectColossus

Docs written by Monotrix

#Starting server

The server.start() function takes one argument: a port number. Starting a server with Colossus is very easy. Once youâ€™ve installed Colossus (see install), follow this code:

const { Server } = require("@projectcolossus/colossus");
const server = Server;
const port = 4000;

server.start(port).then(() => {
    console.log("Hi there!")
});
